flawed_nl_solution:
Today, I will perform 30 + 5 = <<30+5=35>>35 squats.
Tomorrow, I will perform 35 + 5 = <<35+5=40>>40 squats.
So the day after tomorrow, I will perform 40 + 5 = <<40+5=54>>54 squats.
#### 54

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 45, not 54. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
